summary: I PURCHASED A 2007 RAM 2500 DIESEL ON DEC. 31, 2007.  IT HAS BEEN IN THE DEALER 9 TIMES FOR A CHECK ENGINE LIGHT AND THE PROBLEM IS STILL UNRESOLVED.  I AM CURRENTLY DEALING WITH IMPARTIAL SERVICES GROUP ON A BUYBACK WHICH HAS BEEN A NIGHTMARE.  IF THERE IS A PLACE TO FILE A COMPLAINT AGAINST THEM I'D SURE LIKE TO KNOW ABOUT IT.  *TR
